hostname.helper: Enter the host name of the remote FTP server. Leaving this blank suppresses all FTP activeties.

ftpport.helper: Enter the FTP port to use. Common defaults are: FTP=21, FTPS=990, SFTP=22

sslftp.helper: Select the protcol required by your web hoster

sshAuth.helper: Select the authentication method for SFTP connections

pskFile.helper: Filename for your private PSK file, include the full path if the file is not in your CumulusMX folder

includestdfiles.helper: Select this to have the standard web site files uploaded

includegraphdatafiles.helper: Select this to have the graph data files uploaded

includemoonimage.helper: Select this to have the Moon image file uploaded - you must enable the image file generation below

activeftp.helper: Not normally required - use with caution

ftprename.helper: Use this if your FTP server supports it (most do)

ftpdelete.helper: Use this only if your FTP server requires it (most do not)

utf8encode.helper: Use UTF-8 encoding for the standard files

ftplogging.helper: Log FTP activity to ftplog.txt for diagnostic purposes

updateinterval.helper: Interval between web page updates in minutes

enablerealtime.helper: Start the realtime timer so that realtime actions can take place

enablerealtimeftp.helper: Establish the realtime FTP connection so that FTP uploads can take place at the realtime interval

realtimetxtftp.helper: FTP the realtime.txt file at the realtime interval. Cumulus MX does not use this file itself

realtimegaugestxtftp.helper: FTP the realtimegauges.txt file at the realtime interval. Cumulus MX uses this for the SteelSeries gauges

realtimeinterval.helper: Interval between realtime updates in seconds

program.helper: A program or command to be run at each web update interval

programparams.helper: Parameters for the above program or command

realtimeprogram.helper: A program or command to be run at each realtime interval

realtimeprogramparams.helper: Parameters for the above program or command

dailyprogram.helper: A program or command to be run at the start of each day

dailyprogramparams.helper: Parameters for the above program or command

sendlocation.helper: Send your location with each update

password.helper: Used to be your password, but changed to the Station Key (case sensitive)

interval.helper: Interval in minutes between updates. Not used if rapid fire is enabled (5 seconds is used)

includeindoor.helper: Include indoor temperature and humidity in the update

includeuv.helper: Include UV index in the update

includesolar.helper: Include the solar radiation reading in the update

sendavgwind.helper: Send the average wind speed for the current speed

includeaq.helper: Include the pm2.5 (and pm10 if available) data. You also need to set the Primary AQ sensor in Station Options settings

catchup.helper: When Cumulus starts, send each entry read from the station logger

stationidx.helper: Defines which station to upload to. The first station you define is 0 (default), the next 1 etc.

server.helper: Your MQTT Server network name or IP address

useTls.helper: Enable TLS support, currently special certificates are not supported

username.helper: Enter your MQTT server username - if required

password.helper: Enter your MQTT server password - if required

retained.helper: The broker stores the last retained message and the corresponding QoS for the topic. Enabling this means stale data may be avialable to clients

customseconds.helper: A custom HTTP URL to be invoked at an interval in seconds - can include webtags

customminutes.helper: A custom HTTP URL to be invoked at an interval in minutes - can include webtags

customrollover.helper: A custom HTTP URL to be invoked just before end of day rollover - can include webtags
